questions.text: What character from 'The Little Mermaid' makes a cameo in 'Aladdin'?
questions.explanation:
Sebastian.

	Sebastian appears when Genie is looking through a spell book to find out how to make Aladdin a prince.

questions.text: What popular sitcom was Scott Weinger, the voice of Aladdin, a regular on?
questions.explanation:
Full House.

	Scott played Steve, D.J.'s boyfriend on 'Full House'.

questions.text: Who provided the voice of Iago?
questions.explanation:
Gilbert Gottfried.

	Gottfried is a comedian and a regular on 'Hollywood Squares'.

questions.text: When was Jasmine truly convinced that 'Prince Ali' was actually the boy she met in the marketplace?
questions.correct: When he rolled the apple off his shoulder
options: When he took his turban off
When he asked her if she trusted him
questions.explanation:
When he rolled the apple off his shoulder.

	She was suspicious of him when he asked if she trusted him, but she was completely convinced when he pulled that apple stunt. She confronted him by mentioning Abu.

questions.text: Finish this lyric: 'You ain't never had a _______________.'?
What is the pattern on Prince Achmed's boxer shorts?
Name a modern day celebrity that the Genie mimicks.
questions.explanation:
Jack Nicholson.

	He also mimicks Ed Sullivan and Arnold Schwarzenegger.

questions.text: What does the Genie ultimately end up turning Abu into (for Prince Ali to ride on)?
What is the name of Jasmine's pet tiger?
Who is the 'Diamond In The Rough'?
Who provided the singing voice of Princess Jasmine?
questions.explanation:
Lea Salonga & lea salonga.

	She is a Broadway performer and provided the singing voice for the title character in 'Mulan'.

questions.text: Finish this line: 'Oh,I come from a land, from a faraway place where the ____________.'?
questions.explanation:
caravan camels roam.

	Some of the lyrics to this song have had to be changed because they have been thought to be racist.

questions.text: What is the first official wish that the Genie grants for Aladdin?
questions.correct: For the Genie to make him a prince
options: For the Genie to get them out of the cave
For the Genie to make Jasmine fall in love with him
For the Genie to save his life
questions.explanation:
For the Genie to make him a prince.

	For those who believe it was to get out of the cave, Aladdin tricks the Genie into doing that.

questions.text: What is Jasmine accused of stealing of when she is disguised as a commoner in the marketplace?
What nickname does the Genie have for Carpet?
questions.correct: Rugman & Rug Man & rugman & rug man
questions.explanation:
Rugman & Rug Man & rugman & rug man.

	They have been friends for centuries.
